entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
